name: Three Days (itch)
description:
Let the atmospheric soundscape take you on a relaxing journey as you explore a tiny, enchanted forest and gather unusual ingredients to bake magical bread!

Made for Godot Wild Jam #26

Dev notes:

There is a known bug on Windows version where the audio from the radio doesn't play. It's not a game-breaking bug, but if you'd like to hear the radio music, please consider playing the HTML5 version.

The macOS download is currently hidden while I investigate some issues.
